original_text: And behold, there was a woman who had had a disabling spirit for eighteen years. She was bent over and could not fully straighten herself.
korean_text: 열여덟 해 동안이나 귀신 들려 앓으며 꼬부라져 조금도 펴지 못하는 한 여자가 있더라

sentences.original_text: who had had a disabling spirit for eighteen years.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 십팔 년 동안 귀신 들려 앓고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and could not fully straighten herself.
